ibda-c.gloss: a Turkish terrorist organization that claimed responsibility for bombing a British consulate and bank in Istanbul

iberis.gloss: Old World herbs and subshrubs: candytuft

ibex.gloss: wild goat of mountain areas of Eurasia and northern Africa having large recurved horns

ibis ibis.gloss: any of several Old World birds of the genus Ibis

ibizan hound.gloss: breed of slender agile medium-sized hound found chiefly in the Balearic Islands

ibizan podenco.gloss: breed of slender agile medium-sized hound found chiefly in the Balearic Islands

synonyms.word: abu ali al-husain ibn abdallah ibn sina

ibn al-haytham.gloss: an Egyptian polymath (born in Iraq) whose research in geometry and optics was influential into the 17th century

ibn talal hussein.gloss: king of Jordan credited with creating stability at home and seeking peace with Israel (1935-1999)

ibolium privet.gloss: fast-growing and tightly branched hybrid of Ligustrum ovalifolium and Ligustrum obtusifolium

ibota privet.gloss: fast-growing and tightly branched hybrid of Ligustrum ovalifolium and Ligustrum obtusifolium

ibrahim.gloss: the first of the Old Testament patriarchs and the father of Isaac

ibrd.gloss: a United Nations agency created to assist developing nations by loans guaranteed by member governments

synonyms.word: international bank for reconstruction and development

ibsen.gloss: realistic Norwegian author who wrote plays on social and political themes (1828-1906)

ibuprofen.gloss: a nonsteroidal anti-inflammatory and analgesic medicine (trade names Advil and Motrin and Nuprin) used to relieve the pain of arthritis and as an antipyretic

ib..gloss: in the same place (used when citing a reference)

ibid..gloss: in the same place (used when citing a reference)

ibidem.gloss: in the same place (used when citing a reference)
